scripts.dv-start-all: concurrently "npm run dv-start-authentication" "npm run dv-start-authorization" "npm run dv-start-market" "npm run dv-start-event" "npm run dv-start-group" "npm run dv-start-party" "npm run dv-start-supply" "npm run dv-start-gateway"
scripts.dv-start-authentication: if [ -f node_modules/authentication/server/server.js ]; then node node_modules/authentication/server/server.js  --config "`dv get usedCliches.authentication.config`"; else echo "No file"; fi;
scripts.dv-start-watch-authentication: if [ -f node_modules/authentication/server/server.js ]; then nodemon -w node_modules/authentication/server node_modules/authentication/server/server.js -- --config "`dv get usedCliches.authentication.config`"; else echo "No file"; fi;
scripts.dv-start-authorization: if [ -f node_modules/authorization/server/server.js ]; then node node_modules/authorization/server/server.js  --config "`dv get usedCliches.authorization.config`"; else echo "No file"; fi;
scripts.dv-start-watch-authorization: if [ -f node_modules/authorization/server/server.js ]; then nodemon -w node_modules/authorization/server node_modules/authorization/server/server.js -- --config "`dv get usedCliches.authorization.config`"; else echo "No file"; fi;
scripts.dv-start-market: if [ -f node_modules/market/server/server.js ]; then node node_modules/market/server/server.js  --config "`dv get usedCliches.market.config`"; else echo "No file"; fi;
scripts.dv-start-watch-market: if [ -f node_modules/market/server/server.js ]; then nodemon -w node_modules/market/server node_modules/market/server/server.js -- --config "`dv get usedCliches.market.config`"; else echo "No file"; fi;
scripts.dv-start-event: if [ -f node_modules/event/server/server.js ]; then node node_modules/event/server/server.js  --config "`dv get usedCliches.event.config`"; else echo "No file"; fi;
scripts.dv-start-watch-event: if [ -f node_modules/event/server/server.js ]; then nodemon -w node_modules/event/server node_modules/event/server/server.js -- --config "`dv get usedCliches.event.config`"; else echo "No file"; fi;
scripts.dv-start-group: if [ -f node_modules/group/server/server.js ]; then node node_modules/group/server/server.js  --config "`dv get usedCliches.group.config`"; else echo "No file"; fi;
scripts.dv-start-watch-group: if [ -f node_modules/group/server/server.js ]; then nodemon -w node_modules/group/server node_modules/group/server/server.js -- --config "`dv get usedCliches.group.config`"; else echo "No file"; fi;
scripts.dv-start-party: if [ -f node_modules/property/server/server.js ]; then node node_modules/property/server/server.js  --config "`dv get usedCliches.party.config`" --as party; else echo "No file"; fi;
scripts.dv-start-watch-party: if [ -f node_modules/property/server/server.js ]; then nodemon -w node_modules/property/server node_modules/property/server/server.js -- --config "`dv get usedCliches.party.config`" -- as party; else echo "No file"; fi;
scripts.dv-start-supply: if [ -f node_modules/property/server/server.js ]; then node node_modules/property/server/server.js  --config "`dv get usedCliches.supply.config`" --as supply; else echo "No file"; fi;
scripts.dv-start-watch-supply: if [ -f node_modules/property/server/server.js ]; then nodemon -w node_modules/property/server node_modules/property/server/server.js -- --config "`dv get usedCliches.supply.config`" --as supply; else echo "No file"; fi;
